name: The AntiVirus
description:
In "The AntiVirus", you battle viruses that are trying to hack into your system. The only problem is that the battle field is the code that controls you, the player.

Shoot and dodge dangerous softwares while trying to maintain a working code. But be careful - once the code is broken, it's very hard to fix!

Enjoy!

Game made by LordCloud for the 2018 BlackThornProd GameJam.
